name: Albert
biography: Albert Uderzo was a French comic book artist and scriptwriter. The son of Italian immigrants, he is best known for his work on the Astérix series and also drew other comics such as Oumpah-pah, again with René Goscinny.

name: Quentin
biography: Quentin Saxby Blake, CBE, FCSD, RDI, is a British cartoonist, illustrator and children's writer. He may be known for illustrating books written by Roald Dahl.
